title: HoP 088 - Simplicity Itself - Plotinus on the One and Intellect
itunes:title: HoP 088 - Simplicity Itself - Plotinus on the One and Intellect
description: Plotinus posits an absolutely transcendent first principle, the One. What is it (or isn’t it), and how does it relate to Intellect?
